text: The Province of Lleida (; ; ) is one of the four provinces of Catalonia. It is often popularly known as Ponent (i.e. the West). It lies in north-eastern Spain, in the western part of the autonomous community of Catalonia, and is bordered by the Provinces of Girona, Barcelona, Tarragona, Zaragoza and Huesca and the countries of France and Andorra. ==References== ==Other websites== *Patronat de Turisme *Diputaci√≥ de Lleida *Xanascat the National Network of Youth Hostels of Catalonia
